subtitle.track1: hello I would like to book a table
subtitle.track3: nín hǎo wǒ xiǎng dìng yī zhuō fàn

subtitle.track1: ok for what date to you want to book?
subtitle.track3: hǎo de qǐngwèn nín dìng nǎ tiān de?
zhè gè xīngqī liù èr shí wǔ hào wǎnshàng

subtitle.track1: we would like a separate room
subtitle.track3: wǒmen xiǎng yào yī gè bāojiān

subtitle.track1: ok the evening of the 25th for eight people
subtitle.track3: hǎo de èr shí wǔ hào wǎnshàng

subtitle.track1: a private room for eight people
excuse me what is your name?
Mr Wang when do you expect to arrive at the restaurant
subtitle.track2: 王先生，你们估计几点到饭店？
subtitle.track3: wáng xiānsheng nǐmen gūjì jǐ diǎn dào fàndiàn?

subtitle.track1: will be arriving about eight o'clock
subtitle.track3: wǒmen chàbuduō qī diǎn dào ba

subtitle.track1: ok, I will book the room for your from seven thirty
subtitle.track2: 好，我会帮你们把包间保留到七点半
subtitle.track3: hǎo, wǒ huì bāng nǐmen bǎ bāojiān bǎoliú dào qī diǎn bàn, qǐng zài qī diǎn bàn qián dào fàndiàn hǎo ma?

subtitle.track1: please come to the restaurant by seven thirty
subtitle.track2: 请在七点半前到饭店好吗?

subtitle.track1: thank you Mr Wang good bye
